resources.string:
GPS Override 
If problems with the GPS - restart the Jodel app. Make sure the feature is activated in the Jodel Xposed app. 
 
OPs posts are faded a little bit darker 
 
Uploading images 
1. Share an image to Jodel Xposed 
2. Take a picture like normal in Jodel and then long press the image to change to the shared one 
3. Press Volume down to toggle scaling method 
4. If any problems make sure the app has Read/Write access
